title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS. Features include admin panel for managing projects and messages, contact form with email integration, and smooth animations.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
